param.name: system.MACHINE
param.spec: text display='normal' description='Device for which to build' label='Machine' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: system.architecture
param.spec: select description='CPU architecture for which to build' label='Architecture' data_1='armv7vehf-neon' label_1='ARMv7' display='normal'

param.name: system.sstate.server.address
param.spec: text display='normal' description='Public address serving sstate-cache' readOnly='true' label='SState server public address' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: system.sstate.server.location
param.spec: text display='normal' description='Path location of the sstate-cache' readOnly='true' label='Sstate server location' validationMode='any'

param.name: system.sstate.server.upload_address
param.spec: text display='normal' description='Backend adress to upload the sstate-cache' readOnly='true' label='SState server backend address' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: system.sstate.server.user
param.spec: text display='normal' description='Username used to upload sstate-cache' readOnly='true' label='SState server user' validationMode='any'
